name: chatgpt
0:
”Alexa open chat g p t”
”Alexa start chat g p t”
”Alexa open chatgpt”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chat g. p. t.
des: This skill "chatGPT" enables customers to communicate with chatGPT via Alexa voice interface. Customer's utterances are sent to chatGPT and responses are played back to customers. We don't apply any filters on utterances or responses. We pass on previous utterances and responses to chatGPT to support contextual dialogue. Customers can clear the conversation history and restart a new conversation by "reset the dialog".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
